package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Enlightened Sound Daemon
package-manager.description: EsounD mixes multiple digitized audio streams and samples together for playback by a single audio device. It also allows monitoring of mixed output, and recording. Network connections to the daemon are supported as well.
